communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

All timesheets of all employees of the Bosque County Sheriff's department, including but not limited to, the Sheriff, deputies, secretaries, from July 2023 to the present.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Bernadette Feazell

title: Solicitations for products & services for village employees

communications.subject: Illinois Freedom of Information Act. Request: Solicitations for products & services for village employees
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

All letters, emails, memos, texts to vendors, businesses, organizations, and individuals inviting them to participate in a village program for village employees to offer discounts to village employees February 2023 to present.

All letters, emails, memos, texts to village employees and elected officials telling them about this program and the responses.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Carolyn

communications.subject: Illinois Freedom of Information Act. Request: Parent Restriction Letters, FY23, N1
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

Records sufficient to show copies of Parent Restriction letters issued from July 1, 2022 - June 30, 2023 for the following schools/instances:

1. Any district-wide issued letters;
2. Any letters issued by schools in Network One:
ALBANY PARK
BATEMAN
BEARD
BEAUBIEN
BELDING
BRIDGE
CANTY
CATALPA
CHICAGO ACADEMY
CLEVELAND
DEVER
DIRKSEN
EBINGER
EDGEBROOK
EDISON
EDISON PARK
FARNSWORTH
GARVY
GRAY
HENRY
HIBBARD
HITCH
MURPHY
NORWOOD PARK
ONAHAN
ORIOLE PARK
PETERSON
PORTAGE PARK
PRUSSING
REINBERG
SAUGANASH
SCAMMON
SMYSER
SOLOMON
STOCK
VOLTA
WILDWOOD


These may also be listed as "Violation of Visitor Protocol" letters. Please note that I am not seeking any personally identifiable information or otherwise exempt information. As required by the statute, please ensure that the requested documents are redacted rather than exempting the entirety of the document. Additionally, for any and all exemptions used to redact exempt information, please provide clear and convincing evidence for each exemption used by your agency.

Because this request is in the public interest for Illinois nonprofit The FOIA Bakery’s work to advocate for public education, please waive any fees in accordance with 5 ILCS § 140/6(c). Feel free to contact me with any questions, or if clarification is needed.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Miriam Bhimani
